citation.title: Ice-Water Hand Immersion Causes a Reflex Decrease in Skin Temperature in the Contralateral Hand

news.title: Health Check: do cold showers cool you down?
news.summary: It’s normal to feel hot, sweaty and uncomfortable in warm weather, but what’s the best way to cool down? To answer this question, we first need to look at how the body maintains stable internal (core) temperature.

news.title: Science Says This Is The Best Time Of Day To Take A Shower In The Summer
news.summary: To shower at night, or in the morning? This is a question that has plagued me for years, and yet I still haven't found a clear-cut answer.
